title: Kate Green – 2021 Comments on Government’s Tutoring Plans
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kate Green, the Shadow Secretary of State for Education, on 2 June 2021.
content:
This announcement makes a mockery of the Prime Minister’s claim that education is a priority.
